reviewText: I bought this more for seeing this delightful guy again, the recipes are great too.
Reminds me of long time ago... Excellent!

this was for my girlfriend. So it is hard to rate because I never really watched it. She seem to be really happy with it as her family have this she was growing up to her childhood. she was in the tellin. This is rather probably.the cook Italian chef is quite funny and good spirits

The best in learning to cook Italian! Affordale. Is really simple and fast. A true watch and cook. After he died his cooking style still regins. Takes your cooking to a whole new level with so many tips.
i really enjoyed the video. it was nice to see Pasquale again as i did during my college days!  and, i am looking forward to vol. 2! :o)
I caught Pasquale at my "Zia's" house.  She is a long time fan'; I'm a new fan.  Great guy, enjoyable to watch. Lots of fun; especially for those who grew up in Italian homes...

This guy was simply amazing! Pasquale Carpino had one of the most fun cooking shows! Great recipes, skill and singing! He should have been a Food Network star. Can't seem to find any more DVD's on him though....wonder if there were any more after this? Even still, this DVD captures Pasquale in his glory!
